<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.1.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.fiscal_calendar" name="Fiscal Calendar" state="published" help="Fiscal_Calendar_Plugin" type="application" version="1.1.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true">
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.dynamic_operands.datetime" /> </requires>
<description>Fiscal calendar support to create and manage fiscal calendar.</description> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="FiscalCalendar" class="com.snc.fiscal_calendar.FiscalCalendar" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="FiscalCalendarValidator" class="com.snc.fiscal_calendar.controllers.FiscalCalendarValidator" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="FiscalCalendarPrefix" class="com.snc.fiscal_calendar.FiscalCalendarPrefix" /> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Fiscal calendar support to create and manage fiscal calendar.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Fiscal_Calendar_Plugin</help> <id>com.snc.fiscal_calendar</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Fiscal Calendar</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.fiscal_calendar/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.dynamic_operands.datetime</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.fiscal_calendar</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.1.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
